channel.title: Caret Package on Chris's Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Caret Package on Chris's Data Blog

item.title: Showdown: Random Forest vs Regression on EPA MPG Dataset
item.description: Objective: I’m always curious about which model performs the best on data frames. Today I’m going to use the mpg dataset, which contains a subset of the fuel economy data the EPA makes available on http://fueleconomy.gov. I am going to use city miles per gallon as the response variable and the rest of the variables as predictors, or dependent variables. I am also going to use the RMSE measure to compare the models.
